title.part2: I Develop Cool & User-Friendly Web Services That Help Businesses Grow.

content.1: My name is Jesse Wei. I am a trilingual (Chinese, English and Japanese) designer and developer currently based in Japan.
content.2: Trained as a product designer, I started learning programming 8 years ago. Being able to design AND develop helps me contextualize a project by seeing it from the views of users, designers, designers and other stakeholders. This way, I can ensure a solution to be both user-friendly and technically manageable.
content.3: I usually illustrate or brew coffee to treat my friends on my day off. These days, I'm busy practising latte art. I am also fan of LiverpoolFC and the Premier League.

description.3: Feel Free to Get in Touch!
